caption.title: Relative seasonal variation in monthly dengue incidence for SEA countries and China, sorted by latitude, 2005–2015.
caption.p: (A) Time series of monthly dengue cases, standardized by the total number of cases reported in each year and country. (B) Average seasonal distribution of dengue by country, plotted as the proportion of cases reported in each week of the year from 2005 to 2015. The data of “China–import” represents the cases imported from nine SEA countries (Cambodia, Laos, Malaysia, Maldives, Philippines, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Vietnam) into China. The data of “China–local” represents the autochthonous cases reported in China.
